title: Rename app to "K's Lab repair and customization" across branding and metadata

requirements.summary: Update the single source of truth branding constants so the app name and derived title reflect "K's Lab repair and customization".
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/branding.ts` exports `APP_NAME` exactly as "K's Lab repair and customization".
Any derived branding string (e.g., `APP_TITLE`) reflects the updated app name without additional/old naming.

file_operations.description: Update exported branding constants so `APP_NAME` is exactly "K's Lab repair and customization" and ensure computed `APP_TITLE` reflects the updated `APP_NAME`.

requirements.summary: Replace all user-facing occurrences of the old app name with the updated name in the landing hero, header, footer, and HTML document title.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page hero heading displays "K's Lab repair and customization".
Header brand text displays "K's Lab repair and customization" on desktop sizes.
Footer copyright line displays "K's Lab repair and customization".
`frontend/index.html` `<title>` reflects the updated name (and does not contain "K's Lab Customization").
A project-wide search shows no remaining user-facing string "K's Lab Customization" (except where required in historical data/test fixtures, if any).

file_operations.description: Update the HTML document <title> to use the new app name (and remove any occurrence of "K's Lab Customization").
Ensure the marketing landing page hero heading is sourced from `APP_NAME` (no hardcoded old name remains) so it displays "K's Lab repair and customization" after the branding update.
Ensure the header desktop brand text is sourced from `APP_NAME` (no hardcoded old name remains) so it displays "K's Lab repair and customization" after the branding update.
Ensure the footer copyright line is sourced from `APP_NAME` (no hardcoded old name remains) so it displays "K's Lab repair and customization" after the branding update.
